comment: Rich, fruity, sweet. Easy to drink.
Not my favourite sherry oaked whisky in this price range. Tho the quality meets it's affordable price.
got this at the duty-free in edinborough, good but not as good as the auchentoshan three wood
Nose is sweet. Taste is sharp and there is a long, but poor, finish. Elegant isn't exactly the right word...
Nice mouth feel, if a little sharp, and very toffee tasting. Almost slightly sweet. Decent for the price point, and nicer over ice.

Liked the 3 wood for smoothness and subtle caramel and spice, but Duty-Free stuck me with Heartwood as the same. NOT. It’s made for airports, bites the tongue, lacks good flavor. You can taste the old, rotten, recycled casks they use for this cheap export. Beware.
Ganska distinkt men ändå rund och lättdrucken
Not too bad. Very sweet and rather mild. A good after dinner scotch. I would drink when offered, but not buy.

Nose: pleasant vanilla
Palate: a lot of wood spice
Finish: some of the pleasant nose vanilla, mixed with spice
